body:
Comment 1: 
Since we are very close to the 1.4 release, and since we aren't going to make any more
changes to the 1.3 release, and since at least some of the bugs you are reporting have
been fixed in 1.4, it would be much more helpful if you could try the 1.4 beta release. 
Thanks.
_Labels changed: added **repo-main**._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
